title: Nigerian Parliamentary Committee Summons Binance CEO Teng: Report
description: Two executives of the exchange were detained last week on arrival in the country.

title: NFT utility continues to captivate fashion and luxury brands  — NFT Paris
description:
Artists, fashion, and luxury brands showcase the actual utility of NFTs and blockchain technology at NFT Paris.

Artists, designers and luxury brands are proving the real-world utility of nonfungible tokens and blockchain technology as NFT Paris attracted thousands of visitors to France’s capital.

The third edition of NFT Paris, hosted in the shadow of the Eiffel Tower at the Grand Palais Éphémère, showcased Web3’s increasing impact on various industries. Cointelegraph was on the ground to speak to individuals at the forefront of the growing intersection of blockchain technology and mainstream adoption.

Paris is synonymous with fashion, and NFT Paris was no exception. Attendees showcased impeccable taste and style matched with their growing appreciation for the technology driving innovation in the sector.

Read more

title: Dragon’s Dogma 2 Confirms Lack of Manual Save Function
description: Dragon’s Dogma 2, Capcom’s highly anticipated fantasy RPG, is making waves with its unconventional approach to saving mechanics. Unlike traditional RPGs, the game will not feature a manual save function; instead, it will opt for a single save slot and auto-save checkpoints. In Dragon’s Dogma 2, players will be restricted to a single save slot, […]

title: Former Binance execs launch hybrid crypto exchange Blum
description: A group of Binance alumni is launching a crypto exchange called Blum that merges CEX and DEX facilities for a new trading experience.
